definition: to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people

sentences.english: Data security by providing support for username and password authentication and for digital certificates.
sentences.chinese: 通过支持用户名和密码认证以及数字证书的数据安全。

sentences.english: Moreover, it only matches user names of exactly eight characters.
sentences.chinese: 而且，它只匹配恰好八个字符的用户名。

sentences.english: Suppose that the application authenticates a user given a user name and password.
sentences.chinese: 假设这个应用软件鉴定了一个特定的用户名和密码。

sentences.english: The user name and password combo provide a point of weakness.
sentences.chinese: 用户名和密码的组合带来了一个弱点。

sentences.english: A username identifies you on WikiDoc.
sentences.chinese: 用户名用于识别您的身份。

sentences.english: The author posts using the " yak " username.
sentences.chinese: 作者员额用“牦牛”的用户名。

sentences.english: Of course, username and password-based accounts have to be managed as well.
sentences.chinese: 当然，基于用户名和密码的帐户也必须进行管理。

sentences.english: Provide a valid password for the username.
sentences.chinese: 为这个用户名提供有效的密码。

sentences.english: Requires operator to re-enter user name and password before an action is taken.
sentences.chinese: 运营商需要重新输入用户名和密码之前采取行动。

sentences.english: Enter the user name you want to run the application as here.
sentences.chinese: 在此输入您想要以何用户名的身份运行此应用程序。

sentences.english: I discovered that the user names would still be on the page but hidden. So I did a right click on the page and clicked on View Source
sentences.chinese: 我发现用户名仍然在页面上不过是隐藏的。

sentences.english: Chongzhi Please enter the user name, card number and password.
sentences.chinese: 请输入冲值的用户名，卡号和密码。

sentences.english: If you're like me, you own many identifiers or userids.
sentences.chinese: 如果您像我一样，会拥有很多标识符或用户名。

sentences.english: My username is the name of a prophetess in Norse mythology.
sentences.chinese: 我的用户名是名称的先知在北欧神话。

sentences.english: All you need is to fill in a form and remember the user name and the password.
sentences.chinese: 只需填个表格，然后记住用户名和密码就可以了。

sentences.english: Does not allow use of non-mainstream user name.
sentences.chinese: 不允许使用非主流用户名。

definition: verification code/CAPTCHA, a type of challenge-response test (computing)
case sensitive/distinguishing capitals from lowercase letters
